attributes.action: HELP: Crimes Against Humanity, WAR Crimes & Human Rights Violated Harm & Redress
attributes.additional_details:
'Legally Allow' victims to request their ‘information be registered’ as an element of Crime Against Humanity & War Crime etc.

Compel redress teams to reveal statistics on atrocities, esp planned elements of atrocities.

Define redress team & admin as public authorities (HRA S.6)

With Major Wars & Conflicts in the world: eg Tigray War - Russian & Ukraine War. The UK must have home laws; to set an example & GOLD Standard in Redressing Crimes Against Humanity etc & stop accountability prevention
attributes.background:
UK Government must 'STOP Impunity' issues & recognition failures of historical, present & future Crimes Against Humanity etc.

Government must Create Laws to: 'Stop bad practices' in the 
A) Investigation, B) Administration & C) Pay-Out: Of UK Redress Investigation & Compensation Pay-Out Schemes.

rejection.details: We can see you'd like the Government to take action on crimes against humanity, but it's not clear what you'd like the Government to do. A petition must ask for a clear action from the Government or Parliament.
